editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by top athletes, busy professionals, university students and travellers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.flavor_description: The new Red Bull Amber Edition Sugarfree combines the wings of Energy Drink with the perfect blend of Strawberry and Apricot with a touch of Peach. Now without sugarfree
